We sell lockers for charging mobile phone batteries or other devices.
Secure mobile phone battery charging locker.

patterns: Does it adapt to coins from different countries?
responses: If you are in the Eurozone, the value will be 1 euro; if not, the best solution will be to use a token. Adjust the token to indicate the value you desire.

The token is like a coin made of special plastic, which can be used as such. In countries that don't use the euro, it will be a good solution. You can assign any value to the token, and it will also be useful if you don't want to use cash.

patterns: How much is the electricity consumption?
responses: Without any device connected, consumption is 0. Afterwards, consumption depends on the number of connected devices.

patterns: How long does it take to manufacture the machine?
responses: It depends on the order's specialization and stock availability.

patterns: To which countries can you deliver?
responses: Any country, as long as the political and security situation allows it.
It depends on the country, the political situation, and customs clearance.

patterns: Can I make a bank transfer?
responses: Payment can be made via bank transfer or PayPal. Once the locker order is confirmed, you will receive the invoice with payment details. The locker will be sent after the bank confirms the payment.

patterns: When can I receive my order?
responses: Delivery takes between 2 and 4 days.
It will arrive in 2-4 days.
We use cables for fast charging, ensuring the best experience for your customers.
Yes, it's possible to integrate a wireless charger into the locker, but it affects electricity consumption and the machine's price. For more details, contact us via WhatsApp or email.

patterns: Is it possible to charge two devices in one compartment?
Can several devices be charged in one compartment?
How many devices can I charge at once?
responses: Each compartment is equipped with various types of cables. Yes, it's possible to use one compartment to charge two devices that use different cables, but it will affect charging speed.
The locker warranty is one year. Spare cables are also included for each locker, along with an instructional video on how to change them.
